title: United Nations Statistics Division: City population yearly timeseries
name: unsd-citypopulation-year
description:
City population yearly timeseries for female and male, and for both sexes, collected by the United Nations Statistics Division and published by UNData in 22 Dec 2014

Next update in UNdata: Jun 2015 (est.)
Periodicity: biannual.

Contains two datasets in CSV format:	
unsd-citypopulation-year-both.csv		Size: 2.4 MB	
unsd-citypopulation-year-fm.csv		File size: 3.7 MB

Final 222 lines in both datasets contain original notes.

licenses.title: Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and Licence 1.0
